scripts.install: (cd v18 && npm i) && (cd v18ssr && npm i) && (cd v19 && npm i) && (cd v19ssr && npm i) && (cd v19ssrServerRouting && npm i)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd v18 && npm start" "cd v18ssr && npm start" "cd v19 && npm start" "cd v19ssr && npm start" "cd v19ssrServerRouting && npm start"
